name: GraphqlSchemaComperator
author: Atle Esperum
helpMarkDown: Compares two graphql schemas and create a diff json. It can also log the changes to Slack.

inputs.name: graphqlApiName
inputs.label: Graphql API Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name used to difference multiple APIs from each other.

inputs.name: oldSchema
inputs.label: Path to the old schema
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the file with the old schema

inputs.name: newSchema
inputs.label: Path to the new schema
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the file with the new schema that should be compared to the old

inputs.name: schemaDiff
inputs.label: Path to the schema diff json output
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the json output with the shema diff.

inputs.name: failBuildIfApiBroken
inputs.label: Fail build if breaking changes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail build if new schema contains breaking changes compared to the old version

inputs.name: slackBootName
inputs.label: Slack boot name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The slack boot name to use when posting.
